price: ከዚያም (ቁረይሾች ሆይ) ሰዎቹ ከጎረፉበት ስፍራ ጉረፉ፤ (ተመለሱ)፡፡ አላህንም ምሕረትን ለምኑ፤ አላህ እጅግ መሓሪ አዛኝ ነውና፡፡
arabic: ثُمَّ أَفِيضُواْ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ أَفَاضَ ٱلنَّاسُ وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: thumma afīḍū min ḥaythu afāḍa al-nāsu wa-is'taghfirū al-laha inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
